Here is an inteructive map of 15 hottest tech companies in America, according to LinkedIn.  
All of the information on the map comes from the the following source: https://www.cnbc.com/2017/05/18/the-15-hottest-tech-companies-in-america-according-to-linkedin.html

                                         "Salesforce", "Facebook",

                                37.410825, 37.775228, 37.790503,
                                37.483666, 47.414332, 37.422198),

```{r map, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(leaflet)

pal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "YlGnBu",
  domain = addition.df$rank
)

hottest_companies %>%
        leaflet() %>%
        addTiles() %>%
        addMarkers(icon = companyIcon, popup = companySites,
                   clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())



```
